about_the_game:
Welcome to "Together in Between," a unique co-op puzzle experience that challenges the boundaries of perception. Immerse yourself in a world of simplicity and intrigue, where the only colors are black and white. In this minimalist realm, players can't see each other, relying solely on their ability to communicate through sound. Navigate through intricately designed puzzles, working together to overcome challenges and strengthen your connection. Experience the beauty of collaboration in the absence of sight. Are you ready to explore the space "Together in Between"?

Two Partners in Middle Ages find a library and they look around they find a book written in an unknown language. Intrigued by it, one of them innocently makes the mistake of trying to read it, As soon as the book is opened, it starts shining and pulls them inside. Trapped in a place called Dimensia inside the magical book, the couple finds themselves in an old library, absent of any color.



Everything is in your hands. Can you overcome the challenging obstacles with your partner and find the cursed book? Will that be enough to save you? Who is the sorcerer, and why did he trap you? Many mysteries are yet to be unraveled.

  • Cooperate:

    Cooperate with your partner even to breathe. You must overcome the obstacles together and escape from this place. To do so, you need to guide each other correctly.



  • Communicate:

    Communicate with your partner to solve the encountered puzzles. Remember, in this magical world, the only thing you can rely on is the guidance of your partner.



  • Solve:

    Solve many exciting and diverse puzzles with your partner given to you by the sorcerer. With each puzzle you solve, you are closer to unraveling the mystery of the magical realm.



  • Escape:

    You must find the cursed book before it's too late. Otherwise, you will end up like those who have been here before you! Will you survive what the Dimensia has prepared for you or will you be imprisoned here forever?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 32/64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5350U or equivalant
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750TI or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 equivalant or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Together in Between is a first-person adventure-puzzle game. You have been imprisoned in a magic book with your partner, in the same place but in different dimensions. Will you be able to overcome the Wizard-King's puzzles, and see your partner again?
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Swedish, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
